"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>5bb124dc-b916-4740-a179-8167e2793fb9#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Mongol lovasok (1240)</string>
            <string language="en">Mongol horsemen (1240)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mongolische Reiter (1240)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cavaliers mongoliens (1240)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Horsemen mongol (1240)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Horsemen mongol (1240)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μογγόλοι ιππείς (1240)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Jinetes mongol (1240)</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Korbácsot tartó lovas szemből és hátulról</string>
            <string language="en">Horseman holding a lash front-wise and from the rear</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Dzsingisz kán nyíl borpáncél,  </string>
            <string language="en">Genghis Khan arrow leather armour</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reiter, der eine Peitsche vorder-klug und von der 
Rückseite anhält</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cavalier jugeant une mèche avant-sage et de 
l'arrière</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Horseman que mantem um chicote dianteiro-sábio e 
da parte traseira</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tenuta del horseman una sferza 
anteriore-saggia e dalla parte posteriore</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιππέας που κρατά ένα μαστίγιο μπροστινός-σοφό και 
από το οπίσθιο τμήμα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Jinete que lleva a cabo un latigazo 
delantero-sabio y de la parte posterior</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Genghis Khan Pfeil-Lederrüstung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Armure de cuir de flèche de Genghis Khan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Armour do couro da seta de Genghis Khan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Armatura del cuoio della freccia di Genghis Khan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τεθωρακισμένο δέρματος βελών Khan Genghis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Armadura del cuero de la flecha de Genghis Khan</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>

        <rights>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

fn:

        <metaMetadata>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
